name: Boomerangers
description:
Boomerangers is a 3D local multiplayer arena shooter that features the use of boomerangs instead of guns. Through 2-player split screen, come grab a buddy and duke it out in our arena to see who'll reign victorious, claiming the title of Boomerwanger. Now, have fun, try your best, and remember, no screen peeking!

Boomerangers features direction based damage, rewarding players more damage for hitting a player from the behind with your boomerang, so try your best to utilize the return of your boomerang.

DISCLAIMER: Boomerangers does NOT support Intel Integrated Graphics. Ensure that you are running the game using your dedicated graphics card if you are running the game on a laptop or a PC with integrated graphics. This can be done in your GPU Control Panel.

Controls (Controller)
Right Stick - Turn Character
Left Stick - Move Character
Left Trigger - Sprint
A - Jump
Hold Right Trigger - Charge Boomerang
Release Right Trigger - Throw Boomerang
Right Trigger After Thrown - Return Boomerang to you
Left Bumper - Instant Return
Start Button - Pause/Unpause

Controls (Keyboard)
WASD - Move Character 
Arrow keys - Turn Camera
Left Shift - Sprint
Hold Numpad 0/Right control - Charge Boomerang
Release Numpad 0/Right control - Throw Boomerang
Numpad 0/Right control After Thrown - Return Boomerang to you
Q - Instant Return
Enter - Pause/Unpause
